item.title: Rethinking Security
item.description: There are many reasons why I have started to write this article, and its an accumulation of several years of frustrations and experience when dealing with security in large organizations. First and foremost, there are two views on cybersecurity in the organization, one that the senior management has, and the one that the cybersecurity professionals do. So let’s try to light up some sparks… The senior management view The first thing that comes to senior management point of view is that if it isn’t the company’s core competency cybersecurity doesn’t come first.

item.title: Route-based VPN between Check Point on-premise and Azure CloudGuard IaaS HA
